# Pull Request

## Description
Brief description of changes made.

## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Code refactoring

## Component/Service Changed
- [ ] Unified API (`/backend`)
- [ ] Discovery Engine (Property scraping)
- [ ] Valuation Engine (Investment analysis)
- [ ] Dashboard/Frontend
- [ ] Database schemas/migrations
- [ ] Docker/Infrastructure
- [ ] CI/CD workflows
- [ ] Documentation

## Testing
- [ ] Tests pass locally
- [ ] New tests added for new functionality
- [ ] Manual testing completed
- [ ] Docker containers build successfully

## Database Changes
- [ ] No database changes
- [ ] Database migrations included
- [ ] New tables/indexes created
- [ ] Data seeding required

## API Changes
- [ ] No API changes
- [ ] New endpoints added
- [ ] Existing endpoints modified
- [ ] Breaking API changes (requires version bump)

## Security Considerations
- [ ] No security implications
- [ ] API keys/secrets properly handled
- [ ] Input validation added/updated
- [ ] SQL injection protection verified

## Performance Impact
- [ ] No performance impact
- [ ] Performance improvements
- [ ] Potential performance regression (explain below)

## Checklist
- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines
- [ ] Self-review completed
- [ ] Comments added for complex logic
- [ ] Documentation updated
- [ ] No console.log/print statements left in code

## Screenshots (if applicable)
Add screenshots for UI changes.

## Additional Notes
Any additional information, concerns, or context.
